title: GP Appointment Booking System
description: A web application for booking appointments with a GP. This is a secure system for booking appointments with GP. Patients can arrange, view, edit, cancel, appointments with their local GPs. Appointments are scheduled by the system and the GP, administrators can interact with the system to access and manage the schedule.
keyFeatures: Secure system for booking appointments with GP
Patients can arrange, view, edit, cancel, appointments with their local GPs
Appointments are scheduled by the system and the GP
Administors can interact with the system to access and manage the schedule
challenges: My first independent large scale project
This was my first time working with PERN stack.
I have learned on the way everything myself
